archimate:Device.name: Wall Mounted Barcode Scanner (WMBS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
(For Patient Self Check-In, Registration Desks, and Kiosks)
1. Intended Use
• Departments: Outpatient clinics, admissions area, diagnostic imaging, pharmacy, emergency triage • Purpose: Hands-free scanning of QR codes from smartphones or printed documents at check-in stations, kiosks, or entrances
2. Scanning Capabilities
• Scanner Type: o Fixed-mount 2D imaging scanner • Symbology Support: o 2D Codes: QR Code, DataMatrix, PDF417, Aztec o 1D Codes: Code 128, Code 39, EAN-13, UPC, etc. • Scan Angle: o Wide-angle lens (minimum horizontal 40°, vertical 30°) • Scanning Distance: o Optimal range 4–10 inches (10–25 cm) o Supports screen scanning (smartphones/tablets) and paper scanning • Motion Tolerance: o Reads moving QR codes (minimum 5–10 inches/sec), suitable for fast interactions • Image Sensor Resolution: o Minimum 640 × 480 pixels (VGA) or higher
3. Mounting & Enclosure
• Mounting Type: o Wall-mounted or flush-mounted into kiosk housing o Tilt-adjustable bracket or fixed-angle enclosure • Housing Material: o ABS or polycarbonate, tamper-resistant o Antimicrobial, wipe-clean surface for infection control o IP52 or higher for dust/splash resistance • Lighting & Feedback: o Built-in targeting LED, scan confirmation beep and LED indicator o Configurable light ring or chime for user feedback
4. Connectivity Options
• Interface Options: o USB-HID (keyboard emulation) o USB Virtual COM, RS-232 (for legacy systems) o Ethernet interface for networked kiosks • Power: o Powered via USB or external 5V–12V DC (depending on interface) or All-day 18hr battery + charging dock sanitizer o Power draw typically <2.5W
5. Operating System Compatibility
• Plug-and-play with: o Windows 10/11 o Android tablets/kiosks o Thin clients with USB ports • Driver Support: o No driver required (USB-HID) o SDK available for custom integration if needed
6. Environmental & Usage Specs
• Operating Temperature: o 0°C to 40°C • Humidity: o 10–90% non-condensing • Drop Resistance: o Survives accidental knocks (tested to 3 ft/1 m) • EMI/EMC Compliance: o CE, FCC, RoHS
7. Additional Features
• Adjustable scan zone for kiosk integration • Triggerless (auto-scan) mode for hands-free use • Tamper-proof housing with rear-access lock • Privacy shielding for directional scanning (prevents misreads from nearby phones)
